[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@vue-storefront/magento-api](./magento-api.md) &gt; [PriceRange](./magento-api.pricerange.md)

## PriceRange interface

Price range for a product. If the product has a single price, the minimum and maximum price will be the same.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PriceRange 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [maximum\_price?](./magento-api.pricerange.maximum_price.md) | Maybe&lt;[ProductPrice](./magento-api.productprice.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The highest possible price for the product. |
|  [minimum\_price](./magento-api.pricerange.minimum_price.md) | [ProductPrice](./magento-api.productprice.md) | The lowest possible price for the product. |
